attributes.action: Appoint Nigel Farage to  lead Brexit negotiations in Brussels.
attributes.additional_details: As the leader of the largest British political party in the European Parliament Nigel Farage clearly has the support of the British people in their stated wish to the leave the European Union. He is highly experienced in European politics and would be the best placed individual to drive through the tough negotiations required to get the best Brexit deal for Britain.
attributes.background: We call upon the Government to appoint Nigel Farage to lead the Brexit negotiations in Brussels.
